Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogic.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL extends Object
Business Logic Layer class responsible for managing order operations.

Provides methods to add and view orders It sits between the presentation layer and the data access layer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderBLL

      public OrderBLL(List<Product> productList, List<Client> clientList)
      Constructs an OrderBLL instance with the provided lists of products and clients. Initializes the order lists with all orders from the database.
      Parameters:
      productList - Local list of products
      clientList - Local list of clients

  • Method Details

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder(String id, String clientId, String productId, String quantity) throws Exception
      Adds a new order to the database and to orders list if the input is valid.
      Parameters:
      id - Order's id as String
      clientId - Client's id as String
      productId - Product's id as String
      quantity - Product's quantity as String
      Throws:
      Exception - if the input is invalid, the client or product was not found or the product's quantity exceeds the available stock

    • setOrderList

      public void setOrderList(List<Orders> orderList)
      Sets the local list of orders.
      Parameters:
      orderList - Local list of orders to set

    • getOrderList

      public List<Orders> getOrderList()
      Returns the local list of orders.
      Returns:
      List of orders
